name: Arma Mortis
flavorText: For centuries, this tome of weapon schematics was locked away, the items it depicted deemed by its author as too dangerous to ever see the light of day. During the confusion after the reaper invasion of Westmarch, however, the Armis Mortem somehow made its way into your hands.
